members.urls module

members.views module

members.views.login_user(request)[source]

This function will allow the user to login if they already have a account, it will call the userame ad password from the database and check if it matches the details entered by the user, if it does, use the login build-in function and redirect them back to the home page, else redirect back to the login page

Returns:

redirect back to the home page if details are valid

Return type:

redirect

Returns:

if logins details are incorrect, return the login page

Return type:

redirect

members.views.logout_user(request)[source]

This function will be used whne the user wants to logout of the website. It will display a message telling the user that they have been logged out

Returns:

return them back to the home page

Return type:

redirect

members.views.register_user(request)[source]

This function will be used to register a new user, it will render in the register form, once the user enters all the required details in , and if they are valid, the form will be saved to the database, and the user will be logged in and a message will be displayed

Returns:

once logged in they will be redirected to the home page

Return type:

redirect

Returns:

load the register_user.html file with the form

Return type:

render
